oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Analytical calculation of matter effects in two mass-scale neutrino oscillations
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NARAYAN, M
SANKAR, SU
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: solar
three-flavor neutrino oscillations
matter effects
atmospheric neutrino problem
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We consider three active flavor neutrino oscillations where both the mass-square differences play a role in atmospheric neutrino problem. We calculate the matter effects arising due to propagation through earth. We demonstrate that these effects improve the-fit to the electron data vis-a-vis vacuum oscillations but make the fit to the muon data far worse, thus worsening the overall fit. The results of our analytical calculation verify the numerical investigations of this scheme presented earlier by Fogli et al.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: WORLD SCIENTIFIC PUBL CO PTE LTD
